BLL

Class Worker

  • java.lang.Object
    • BLL.Worker
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Client, Contractor, Freelancer, Staff

    public abstract class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all workers e.g. staff, sub-contractors, etc.
